sen.e: OGIMACHISANJO Kiminaka (May 18, 1557- Aug. 12, 1594) was a court noble of the Azuchi-Momoyama Period.

sen.j: 堂上家（家格は大臣家、藤原北家公季流三条庶流）である正親町三条家の15代当主。
sen.e: He was the 15th head of the Ogimachisanjo family (lineage can be traced to Sanjo's branch family of Kinsue line of the Northern House of the Fujiwara clan) who were tosho-ke (the hereditary lineage of Court nobles occupying relatively high ranks).
